articles.author: Theresa Loconsolo
articles.title: OpenAI wants to power your browser, and that might be a security nightmare - TechCrunch
articles.description: The browser wars are heating up again, this time with AI in the driver’s seat.  OpenAI just launched Atlas, a ChatGPT-powered browser that lets users surf the web using natural language and even includes an “agent mode” that can complete tasks autonomously. I…
articles.content:
The browser wars are heating up again, this time with AI in the drivers seat.
